de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers

Class BalloonMarker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.Marker
      • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.BalloonMarker

  • public class BalloonMarker
extends Marker
    Draw a marker shaped like a balloon in comics, when a character talks.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_COLOR
      The balloon's default color.

      • Fields inherited from class de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.markers.Marker

        rgbColor, t

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BalloonMarker(Trackable t)
      Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the tackable's name.
      BalloonMarker(Trackable t, String colorString)
      Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the tackable's name.
      BalloonMarker(Trackable t, String colorString, String caption)
      Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the caption text.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_COLOR

        public static final String DEFAULT_COLOR
        The balloon's default color.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • BalloonMarker

        public BalloonMarker(Trackable t)
        Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the tackable's name. The BalloonMarker color is set to DEFAULT_COLOR.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable to put the marker on

      • BalloonMarker

        public BalloonMarker(Trackable t,
             String colorString)
        Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the tackable's name.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable to put the marker on
        colorString - the String representing the Balloon's color (e.g. #CC0000);
        Throws:
        InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated

      • BalloonMarker

        public BalloonMarker(Trackable t,
             String colorString,
             String caption)
        Draws a cartoon like balloon on top of the Trackable, displaying the caption text.
        Parameters:
        t - the trackable to put the marker on
        colorString - the String representing the Balloon's color (e.g. #CC0000);
        caption - the text to display inside the balloon
        Throws:
        InvalidColorException - if the color string is misformated

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        public org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB getRGB()
        Get the RGB color for the marker. It corresponds to the Balloon color.
